Epigenome Data Browse-R: an interactive statistical browser for population genomics¶

Visit the online demo¶

Get source code from the EDB github repo.

This documentation is under active development. This message will be removed when the first round of revisions is nearly complete. ETA: Early October 2014. – Shraddha Pai, 5 September 2014.

    • 5.2. Selecting plot settings
    • 5.3. Sample selector

    • 6.1. Add a datatype handler
